creator: er.priya.mudoi@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 29967
Logs

I was running load test for an api call URL with threads=5000, loop count=1, ramp up period=1. after executing almost a few thousand threads the jmeter got hang up and in the cmd promt I saw 
Exception in thread "Thread-85816" java.lang.NullPointerException.

Please refer to the screen shot for more logs.

Please let me know if this issue is a jmeter specific issue. Also, please let me know if there is any workaround for the same. Is this bug has been fixed in any version of jmeter that is higher than 2.4?

Thanks much!
Priya
creator: er.priya.mudoi@gmail.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Feel free to test with 2.9.
Fixes have bee made on this part as of these versions.

Once tester with new version, if you still have issue reopen this one with more details:
- what did you do for this to happen
- simple test plan showing issue

Closing as no response from reporter.
Feel free to reopen if issue is reproduced.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
